scheme_name: Grant-in-Aid Scheme To Provide Financial Assistance To The Mahila Mandals/Women's Self-help Groups (SWAWLAMBHAN)
description: The Grant-in-Aid Scheme (SWAWLAMBHAN) in Goa provides financial assistance to womenâ€™s self-help groups (SHGs) and Mahila Mandals for training and self-employment activities, promoting economic independence and community development.

benefits.financial_assistance: Up to Rs. 2 Lakhs per SHG for self-employment activities

activity_criteria: Must undertake self-employment or training activities

steps: Obtain the application form from the Directorate of Women and Child Development, Goa
Submit the application through the SHG with a project plan
Attach required documents, including SHG registration and activity details
Applications are reviewed by the directorate
Approved SHGs receive grants and training support
application_process.note: Applications are processed through SHGs or Mahila Mandals

special_notes: Funding is provided to groups, not individuals
Priority is given to groups with sustainable projects
